bridges.context_bridge: I noticed your North Star designation of quantum and AI as two of DoD's 14 Critical Technology Areas following your May 2025 appointment as Pentagon CTO. As you synchronize these technologies enterprise-wide while accelerating commercial tech transition through DIU, a multi-stakeholder coordination framework becomes essential. I'd welcome the opportunity to share how InfraFabric's governance framework could help orchestrate quantum-AI integration across defense technology development while maintaining security requirements.

I noticed your April 2025 launch of Ironwood TPU achieving 42.5 exaflops and your March 2025 emphasis on networking as the #1 bottleneck with demand growing 10x annually. As you tackle this networking constraint limiting distributed inference workloads at hyperscale, quantum-enhanced communication channels could transform your architecture. I'd welcome the opportunity to share how InfraFabric's quantum-safe AI infrastructure orchestration could address the networking bottleneck you identified while scaling with your 10x demand trajectory.

I noticed your February 2025 Nature paper announcing the Omega photonic chipset with all components for million-qubit systems and your simultaneous groundbreaking of Brisbane and Chicago quantum compute centers. As you coordinate distributed photonic architecture at million-qubit scale using manufacturing-ready silicon photonics, network orchestration becomes critical. I'd welcome the opportunity to share how InfraFabric's distributed quantum network management could coordinate your photonic architecture leveraging the inherent networking advantages of your silicon photonics platform.

I'd welcome the opportunity to share how InfraFabric's hybrid quantum-classical coordination layer could build open AI infrastructure today that gracefully incorporates quantum accelerators tomorrow through the same standards-based philosophy you've championed.
